Class DutchElectionParser

java.lang.Object
nl.hva.elections.xml.utils.xml.DutchElectionParser
public class DutchElectionParser extends Object
Processes the XML data files for the Dutch elections. It is completely model agnostic. This means that it doesn't have any knowledge of the data model that is being used by the application. All the datamodel specific logic must be provided by a separate classes that implements one of the Transformer interfaces.
It can process all the files that are provided by the Kiesraad. It behaves similar as the visitor pattern.

The data in the XML files has a more or less hierarchy structure. When a method of the transformer is called, a
invalid reference 
Map
containing all the information on that level, including the information at the higher levels, is provided. The
invalid reference 
Map
is specified as: Map<String, String>. It is up to the transformer to convert any numerical information from its String representation into its appropriate datatype.

It assumes that filenames have NOT been changed and that the content has not been altered!
Most likely you don't have to alter this class, but if you feel you need to, please feel free :-)

NOTE: There are some TODO's present that need fixing!

  • Constructor Details

    • DutchElectionParser

      public DutchElectionParser(DefinitionTransformer definitionTransformer, CandidateTransformer candidateTransformer, DutchRegionTransformer dutchRegionTransformer, VotesTransformer resultTransformer, VotesTransformer nationalVotesTransformer, VotesTransformer constituencyVotesTransformer, VotesTransformer municipalityVotesTransformer)
      Creates a new instance that will use the provided transformers for transforming the data into the application specific data model.
      Parameters:
      definitionTransformer - the transformer that will be called while processing the structure file.
      candidateTransformer - the transformer that will be called while processing the candidate lists files.
      resultTransformer - the transformer that will be called while processing the result file.
      nationalVotesTransformer - the transformer that will be called while processing the national votes file.
      constituencyVotesTransformer - the transformer that will be called while processing the constituency votes files.
      municipalityVotesTransformer - the transformer that will be called while processing the municipality votes files.

  • Method Details

    • parseResults

      public void parseResults(String electionId, String folderName) throws IOException, XMLStreamException, ParserConfigurationException, SAXException
      Traverses all the folders within the specified folder and calls the appropriate methods of the transformer. While processing the files it will skip any file that has a different election-id than the one specified. Currently, it only processes the files containing the 'kieslijsten' and the votes per reporting unit.
      Parameters:
      electionId - the identifier for the of the files that should be processed, for example TK2023.
      folderName - The name of the folder that contains the files containing the election data.
      Throws:
      IOException - in case something goes wrong while reading the file.
      XMLStreamException - when a file has not the expected format.
      ParserConfigurationException
      SAXException
